text: Planning Magazine is a monthly publication of the American Planning Association. The headquarters is in Chicago. It offers news and analyses of events in planning (including suburban, rural, and small town planning, environmental planning, neighborhood revitalization, economic development, social planning, and urban design). ==References== ==External links== * Category:Business magazines published in the United States Category:Monthly magazines published in the United States Category:Design magazines Category:Magazines with year of establishment missing Category:Magazines published in Chicago Category:Professional and trade magazines
title: Planning Magazine
